scan_table_check.description: An ATF test suite without any ATF tests and no child suites just does not make any sense. An empty ATF test suite indicates incomplete work or a mistake.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - ATF suite contains at least one test
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add at least one test (or a suite) to the ATF test suite or delete the ATF test suite if it is no longer needed.
scan_table_check.short_description: An ATF test suite must contain at least one ATF test or a child suite.
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - ATF suite contains at least one test
